subdisciplines.name: Audience and Reception Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of how audiences interact with and interpret media and cultural products.

subdisciplines.name: Fan Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of the social and cultural practices of fans, particularly in relation to media and entertainment franchises.

subdisciplines.name: Reader-Response Theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of how readers interpret and respond to literary texts.
